One of my all-time favorite games.

Single player:
It's very fun and just.. portal. I enjoy puzzle games in general, but the use of portals adds an entirely new depth to it. It really does make you think differently, hence "Thinking with portals". As the second game in this franchise, it really experiments with new ideas. With the addition of the excursion funnels, light bridges, the different gel types, etc, it adds all these brilliant things into game that I already loved. On top of the great mechanics and challenging puzzles that build the base for this game, there's just enough humor and story elements sprinkled in to make it a really unique experience.

Co-op:
The co-op is on an entirely different level. Now instead of 2 portals, you have to think with 4? And work together, resisting the urge to send your partner-in-science shooting into the pits below? Now that's a challenge. On a serious note, the co-op does require a lot of teamwork and thinking outside the box. Doing puzzles with 2 people, 2 portals each is much different than doing puzzles alone. The co-op built into the game is fantastic as is, but the community maps are something I can appreciate after originally playing this game on console. From the unique puzzle maps, to the gel racing maps, it reinstalled my love for this game with new content.

Ratings:
Gameplay       9
Enjoyment    10
Multiplayer     9
Replayability  5
Overall        9.5

Highly recommend
big brain time!

Si jugaste el primer portal y te gustó lo que viste, preparate porque esta secuela deja a su antecesor como una demo de 3 horas. Toma el concepto tan original de puzzles con portales y lo expande en todos los sentidos, tanto en el gameplay, en su historia, en su apartado gráfico; en fin lo profundiza. Se nota como el equipo de desarrollo de Valve le pone su toque en muchos puntos del juego. 
Si tuviese que dar las razones de porque debes comprarlo y jugarlo, puedo resumirlo en que el juego está estructurado en una forma de afrontar la trama que me recordó mucho a los half-life, con detalles en todo momento. Desde el lado jugable, sigue utilizando portales de entrada y de salida, pero mientras avanza el juego añade distintos tipos de implementos que juegan con la física del entorno para resolver los puzzles (fluidos de hipervelocidad, de repulsión, campos gravitacionales, etc). 
Por fuera del modo historia, existe el apartado de mapas hechos por la comunidad que son una locura, la oportunidad de jugar en co-op tanto la historia como el modo comunidad, modos de desafío, y niveles agregados como citas de audios con conceptos del equipo de desarrollo mientras estaban organizando el juego.
Es un juego que me dejó una gran sensación al terminarlo, al igual que el primero. Es corto pero vale mucho la pena, muy recomendado!

[h1] Дурак и Картошка [/h1]
Неспроста заголовок звучит, как название басни. Ведь эта потрясающая игра ни что иное, как притча о предательстве, прощении и дружбе. На протяжении всего повествования Portal 2 будет удивлять забавными монологами, бросать в самые необычные ситуации и в самом прямом смысле доставлять удовольствие самим своим существованием.

[b] [Плюсы] [/b]
+ На первый взгляд простой сюжет, за которым скрываются интереснейшие персонажи (сюда можно отнести даже Кейва Джонсона, чьи голосовые записи очень грамотно раскрывают его как персонажа), необычные сюжетные ходы и множество мелких деталей, которые можно спокойно пропустить;
+ разнообразные декорации в рамках одной лаборатории, которым позавидовала бы даже Чёрная Меза;
+ по сравнению с первой частью увеличенное многократно число механик, начиная от мостов плотного света, заканчивая различными гелями для изменения поверхностей;
+ кооперативный режим, который показался мне гораздо сложнее одиночной игры, что делает его только интереснее.

[b] [Минусы] [/b]
- Довольно простая в плане геймплея битва с финальным боссом (если его можно так назвать).

[b] [Итог] [/b]
Определённо одна из лучших игр, взлетевшая на несколько голов выше первой части, и точно стоящая прохождения. Кооперативный режим же только продлит удовольствия от испытаний.

[b] [9 дефектных турелей из 10] [/b]

Similar to the portal 1 experience, but longer and with co-op. It isn't stuck in the past, it adds new mechanics, and it retains the soul of the previous game. The single-player feels a bit lengthy, but you should definitely complete it nonetheless. Portal 1+2 are among the greatest games

I'm not gonna be one of those people that says 'just buy the game'. Instead here's an actual review for undecided people. A while back I watched a video reviewing a seperate game in which the reviewer said they knew while playing that they were making memories. And that at some unkown later date would look back at that point in time. They said 'can you really put a price on memories?'. I'm not gonna describe the game to you, instead Ill leave you with this: buy it, it's 10 bucks, set a timer for an hour and 50 minutes, if time feels like it flew to that point than your gonna like portal, and as I know that everything does not appeal to everyone just because its a good game, if the timer goes off and your bored out of your mind, quit the game and refund it. 

In terms of length I managed to finish the game in 6 and a half hours, however I have heard that aside from speedrunners that is on the fast side of things. Also if your going to buy portal 2 spend the extra 5 bucks and get the bundle with the original portal as well.

Assim como o primeiro portal é um level design ótimo.
O jogo te apresenta as mecânicas e naturalmente você utiliza ela, das mais variadas formas pra resolver o mesmo puzzle.
A história é muito boa assim como do primeiro, e ainda tem o modo co-op que é muito bom, fazer a campanha com um amigo é divertido.
